unnormalised: Crop insurance, bhaiyon! It's a lifesaver, no? Especially with unpredictable monsoons in Maharashtra. Heard the Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana helped farmers after the floods last year. Wish payouts were faster, like the speed we finish biryani during Eid! Gotta protect our hard work, especially after putting in all that mehnath. Thinking of signing up before Onam. Rs. 5000 per acre seems worth it for peace of mind, considering climate change. My khet is about 2 km away. What are your experiences?
